website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and well-made Wonder Woman costume that your dog will find easy to wear.
pros: Officially licensed DC Comics pet costume
Comes in small, medium, large, and X-Large
2-piece costume features a Wonder Woman dress and a matching headpiece
cons: Some buyers said they received the wrong costume

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my baby girl right after she ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my baby girl right after she was diagnosed with cancer. It's her superhero cancer fighting dress!
customer_reviews.author: Anita M. Storey

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought XX-Large for my 72 lb Siberian Husky. Fits well since it stretches, tho I did not close the Velcro closest to her neck, I think it would have been a little tight. SHE hates it, but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: JBD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Cats
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my cat because who wouldn’t want to see a cat dressed as Wonder Woman on Halloween! Let me tell you, the moment I put it on her she started running around the house, leaping off furniture, climbing curtains and rolling around on the floor in her excitement. She loved it so much. Her headpiece wouldn’t stay on during her enthusiastic race around the house but her costume did. In fact, she loved her costume so much she started biting and scratching when I tried to take it off. A great buy! I bought a small and she is 11 lbs and it was a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow my dog looks so adorable! It made me laugh so hard to see her running through the field with this on! The little head piece she isn't a huge fan of, but eventually she got use to it and did not care about it anymore. The material is great for the price. Its a little snug on her and i got XXL, she is a slender GSD and weighs about 70 pounds. I do not regret buying this at all! *Just be sure to measure your dog before you buy, that way you will get the right size! I did a little photo shoot with her in it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Every large dog needs this costume!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start? This is seriously the best dog costume I've seen!!! The quality is top notch, it fits perfectly, and the material has just enough stretch to provide a comfortable fit. I was so excited to do a mini photo shoot with it. The best part though is both dogs (Golden Retriever and Standard Poodle), were so proud to wear it, they were prancing around like they were Wonder Woman. I'm so glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Candace OwensTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Loved this costume!
customer_reviews.text: Wonder Woman movie comes out today and I thought this would make for a cute photo shoot of my pup. Great quality costume and apparently it was comfortable because she didn't fuss about it. Could not keep the headband on her though. You win some, you lose some. Model: Sasha, Siberian Husky pup 9 weeks old weighing 9 lbs. Size: Small
customer_reviews.author: Lety

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit with our trick-or-treaters and our dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog received compliments on her Wonder Woman costume all night during Halloween when she helped us to greet trick-or-treaters at our front door. We even had people requesting to take photos of and with our dog. This costume is adorable and seems comfortable for our pet. She weighs 67-70 lbs and we purchased the size XL. It fits perfectly. We highly recommend this Wonder Woman costume for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lynn

customer_reviews.title: but the results worked and everyone loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Cute costume, but my Bully has a weird body shape, so I needed to order a big size to fit her chest, but then I needed to re-size the overall length back down to her size. it was a challenge, but the results worked and everyone loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Mirgliotta

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely darling! I bought a medium for my 15 lb Jackabee and it fits her perfectly! She is pretty long but otherwise very small (a little over 16" from base of neck to start of her tail) and a lot of times outfits that fit her around the belly are too short, and outfits that are the appropriate length are too loose around her chest, but this one fit just right. The tiara headband looks like it will be too big (she has a pretty small head) but I haven't had a chance to try it on her yet. The dress itself is perfect! She also didn't seem to mind wearing it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Wonderdog!
customer_reviews.text: So cute bought a XL for my 50lb and fit her perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyne

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I have a 8 pound wire haired dachshund. I ordered the small and it looks great on her. I do need to give it a slight alteration but it is the perfect length and style for her. She can't have sleeves as she has very short legs...She 's also a little narrow so I'm going to pinch it in a bit,,,but the sizing is close enough! Very comfortable for her and very cute! Her brother got the superman in medium!
customer_reviews.author: D. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great costume ! perfect fit for the length and circumference of her 87lb torso but a bit tight under her armpits. I made two small cuts in the fabric to give her bigger arm holes. Loved the headband accessory! The kids all knew my white shepherd was wonder woman, super cute! Ordered xxxl. Tip if your dog hates wearing this check to see if the band under their arms is digging in.both: when they are laying down and standing up...if it is order a size up or cut a slit in the fabric so your pooch can be comfy .
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Simply Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My Wonder Woman Olive was a huge hit when she wore her outfit to the Town Square on Halloween! It’s a comfortable outfit for dogs to wear unlike some I’ve put Olive through🙄. It’s very stretchy which is always a plus when it comes to dressing a dog! This costume was a size Medium and Olive weighed about 18/19 pounds at the time and these were her other measurements: Neck- 11" Chest- 19" Waist- 13" Back Length- 16" Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: TNShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the quality of the materials. It's got a very nice shine to it and definitely fits the Wonder Woman theme. There are some loose threads that we'll have to trim, but overall it seems like a really cute little costume, especially for the price. I highly recommend measuring your pup before buying it, and use their sizing chart. Our dog (30 lbs) fell between a medium and a large for all of the measurements so we opted for a large. I'm glad we did because I think the medium would have been too small. I'm really excited to see people react to her in this adorable costume come Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: S. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Material stretches a little
customer_reviews.text: My dog is in btw sizes so I bought the XXL... it’s a little too big around the body. I’ll have to sew or pin it before Halloween. I was afraid the XL would be too small (usually is tight). My dog is 65lbs and size 29 chest. Material does stretch a little, so maybe I could’ve gotten away with XL...?
customer_reviews.author: LeeLee

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Woofin
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a costume made for big dogs! My lab is 56 lbs and the xxl is a little loose on her. She hates me, but looks adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Allen

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Costume I've Gotten EVER
customer_reviews.text: One of the best dog costumes I've gotten. A lot of them do not always fit all shapes of dogs well but this has stretch knit fabric that will fit around the torso and then a loose but very full skirt at the bottom. It just works so well if you pick the right size (my 30 pound dog is wearing the Large size in this photo. The fabric is so bright with a shiny metallic appearance and the headband while it doesn't tend to stay on without help, is super cute for photos. I am so impressed with the quality of this costume I definitely will be looking to get other Rubies costumes!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality costume. I bought the 3xl costume for my 130 pound bull mastiff. It’s a little tight around her shoulder area but it’s a very stretchy costume. She hulled out (stretched) the velcro once but I just velcroed it back together no problem. My dogs measurements are 36 bust 21 neck 13 arm 29 neck to tail The length is great, and it comes with a cute hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Take a few things into consideration on measurement charts
customer_reviews.text: I have a 60 lb catahoula leopard dog. According to the size chart this should fit her perfectly however it doesn't take into consideration that my dog is all muscle and jacked. It doesn't fit her :( it fits great in her waist but not in her massive shoulders and chest. We love this costume so so much and we will find a way to make it work but just a reminder that although the measurement chart is correct just consider the muscles on your dog! The top part starts wiggling down right away because her chest area is so big! Otherwise it's great material, it's long and perfect and really is such a nicely made costume!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie H

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pet costume! Super cute, made of decent material and my dog seemed pretty comfortable in it. It did run big on my dog, that is the only reason I am giving it 4 stars and not 5. Although I will say I did not take the time to measure my dog and see what was the appropriate size. So that is my own fault. But even with a bit larger size it was very cute to watch her run around! Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Lmon95

customer_reviews.title: Super Adorable
customer_reviews.text: The large fits our 33lb (deep chested) Whippet perfectly. Head band was a loose and not very secure due to the small velcro attachment; so instead, I just double knotted it under her chin for a better, more secure fit. Length and quality was great, doesn't seem cheaply made. The skirt extends to the underbody, so when sizing up--if you have a shorter dog with a large chest--it may be a tripping hazard. Otherwise, would definitely recommend; it will surely to put a smile on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed but still great costume.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great costume. I did not get to try it on my girl but seemed as though it will fit. I actually returned this product because as you can see in the pictures there are places where the red is rubbed or wiped off causing a white or silver color to appear. I opted to be sent a replacement for the defected item but seems as though the product comes this way. If small imperfections like this don't bother you, then you will fully enjoy this costume on your fur baby. Im a very visual/ slightly ocd person so things like this really bother me.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Size is definitely not true.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this but had to return it because it didn’t come in an xsmall. I ordered the small and the size was huge! More like a medium, but the hole for the neck was enormous, more like a medium or large.
customer_reviews.author: MrsCrise

customer_reviews.title: I might have been better off with a XL- but I'm keeping this one
customer_reviews.text: I have an 84 pound Golden Retriever with a broad chest. Based on the reviews and size chart, I purchased the XXL for her. This costume runs big. I might have been better off with a XL- but I'm keeping this one. The skirt is long and I am planning to shorten a bit. The headpiece is also a bit big for her head and I can shorten as well to insure it stays on. Otherwise quality is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: The size chart is wrong
customer_reviews.text: The size chart was completely off. The costumes too big and when I ordered it said free returns, but when I tried to return it so i could order a smaller size the return shipping was almost as much as the costume, so i guess im stuck with it. Its an ok costume, but you could find a higher quality one else where.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved this costume- I ordered two for my bulldogs and although it did not quiet fit them, I still used them as their costumes because they are way too cute. Quality is excellent, not cheap at all. I recommend , just look at sizes. Or give yourself time in case you have to exchange. (My Bulldog is 58 lbs and a XL did not clip on her neck. I’m sure it would fit better on a smaller dog)
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Might be a little snug under the arms
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this Wonder Woman outfit for my female Great Pyrenees. She is 120lbs, but tall and long and it was pretty snug, especially under the arm pits. I actually cut a small slit under each arm pit so it wouldn't pull so tight under there or rub. It stayed put and she tolerated it very well and it was super cute. I think its just challenging to gauge the sizing for your dog. (I didn't follow all the measurements, I did a best guess estimate.)
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE!
customer_reviews.text: O-M-G! This costume is absolutely adorable. However, if I would have gone according to the recommended measurements my furbaby should have been a M. She is a small 8 1/2 point shih-tzu mix and the size small fit her perfectly. She looks so sassy and adorable! She is ready to fight crime this Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Large for my puppy because I fully anticipate her getting larger still. Everything fit as expected except the Tiara. I expected it to fit around her head considering how large the costume was. Lana was very comfortable, but sad there were no trick or treaters this year. Good thing I got a size bigger so she can wear it next year too.
customer_reviews.author: Anxious dog

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Decent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was very cute! Nice fabric and my pup looked adorable in it! She was a 4 month old golden on Halloween, and weighed about 25lbs. I ordered a large, by looking at their chart, and it fit perfectly! However, the headband snapped/broke while I was trying to put it on her, that part was poor quality. I did like the material, wasn't too cheap, especially for the price, and was easy to get on her! Overall, I really loved it and so did all the people on my college campus, friends on Facebook and the trick or treaters back home!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 45lb American Staffordshire Terrier and the size Large fit perfectly...she wasn't trying to take it off or anything. I was concerned about the headband but it was comfortable enough to lie flat and she didn't find it annoying. Would recommend it definitely!!
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA G. -New York

customer_reviews.title: My dog won a contest in this!
customer_reviews.text: This costume was so cute! I got a 3xl for my German Sheperd mix and it was a bit too big. She's about 65 lbs. But, it was still so cute! She won a Best Superheroe contest at our local shelter! I was so proud of my little girl! Definitely as described and good quality!
customer_reviews.author: AlonzoFam

customer_reviews.title: Presenting Pebbles the Wonder Woman... I mean Wonder Dog.
customer_reviews.text: I've already tried the costume on my dog and everyone who sees her picture just loves it! I have a 50 lbs Pit mix and I bought the XL for her (Pebbles). It is a little bit snug around the chest, but other than that, it fits really well. It's the first time I have ever bought a dog costume and I really love it. I think Pebbles likes it, too! :) The material is pretty sturdy, the inside is lined with soft felt. It's not heavy, though. All in all, I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Celtica

customer_reviews.title: Adorable But Itchy!
customer_reviews.text: My dog (American Bulldog) looked ADORABLE and pranced all around to show it off. The headband stayed on really well. I only took off a star because I think this costume was really itchy for her! Usually she doesn't mind keeping things on, but she kept rolling around to scratch her back.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Davies

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: So bummed this didn't fit our baby. Based on measurements and other reviews, we thought the XL would fit perfectly. She is a lab/hound mix and about 45 pounds. However, she has a large chest/ribcage. Fit perfectly everywhere else other than there. She couldn't walk as it was too tight around her front arms. Awesome quality for the price. Would recommend this product and hope it fits your fur baby. Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy P.

customer_reviews.title: Too adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this costume! I have a female Yellow Labrador roughly 75 lbs and the fit was almost perfect! The arm holes on the top were big enough, although placed a little high up for a dog. So I may end up cutting a little slit on the shoulders so that it doesn’t pull so tight on her back. It makes it look like it’s sagging down her back when she sits. It’s still loose enough on the chest between the front legs though. Other than that, I couldn’t be more pleased with the outfit😍🐾
customer_reviews.author: Tinielle Cassity

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Wuffin!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute costume! I gave it 5 stars because you can’t beat the price! The material does rub off in some places as she plays but again it was like 15 bucks and it’s still super cute! Beats the 30-40 costumes at pet stores. Reviews saying this runs small are FALSE. She is a 50 lb Doberman and we got her the XXL. I also did buy big on purpose cuz she’s growing like crazy and I want her to be able to wear next year. I’m using ribbon right now to keep it in place. Overall super cute costume and can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, run small
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 11 lb Shih Tzu perfectly in a size Medium. These run VERY SMALL! The costume velcros down the chest and the fabric has a little stretch to it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A

customer_reviews.title: It fit her great, and she actually liked it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this costume for our 5month old rough collie. It fit her great, and she actually liked it! I didn't even try to use the headband, since I knew she wouldn't go for anything on her head, but it's cute. The fabric is super shiny/bright colored. She seemed comfortable, and was walking around in the costume for the majority of the evening. It has Velcro in the front to fasten it closed.
customer_reviews.author: hme013

customer_reviews.title: EVERYBODY LOVED!
customer_reviews.text: Daisy & I volunteer at a hospital she was a HUGE HIT in this costume! She doesn't do well with things on her head so I cut the straps off & used a safe hair sticker to place on her head! The costume is well made and very shiny! I gave it a 4 because it didn't fit the neck & chest area it was HUGE I tied the pits together with a string which helped a Large would of been to small... Daisy is a 50lb lab mix!
customer_reviews.author: DeadWomnDrivn

customer_reviews.title: This costume is so adorable! It fits great
customer_reviews.text: This costume is so adorable! It fits great. Easy to put on. Only thing is that the headband is a bit larger so it falls off but I just adjusted it with Velcro n the problem was fixed. My pitbull loves her new dress. She's about 50 lbs and I bought an XL
customer_reviews.author: Lissette Guadalupe

customer_reviews.title: Great Halloween outfit
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I got the XL accidentally (thought I got an XXL but I don’t think that’s even an option). It did not fit either of my dogs, but that was my fault for not looking at the sizing. My dogs for reference are 80lb plus labs. I gave it to my friend for her dog and it was adorable for Halloween. I would say her dog is approx 50lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan L

customer_reviews.title: Sizes not accurate or according to their measurements chart
customer_reviews.text: I have a 20lb puppy that wears midium size. I order a medium and had to return, it was too small. I order large and had to return because it just didn't fit comfortably around the legs and too big around the neck. This item is not made correct nor are the measurements as suscribes. Just trash!
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes J.

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size larger
customer_reviews.text: Made half decent with nice design and colors but it is smaller than listed. Buy a size or 2 larger. I went by the dimensions for sizing my dog and she was stuffed in it like a sausage casing. Stitching is not all that strong though
customer_reviews.author: Nun Ya

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but the costume runs small
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, but runs small. I got an XL for my 60 lbs husky, and it was a bit too small. I had to cut a slit into the arm holes to get it to go on her. The headband was too big - just had to tie a knot in it. Other than the costume being a bit small and the headband too big, it's a adorable and very shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size runs big on one order, then small on nxt order
customer_reviews.text: Ordered an xxlg according to reviews running small. It was to big f boxer weighing 68lbs. Reordered an xlg....it was to small, couldnt get both front legs in it....not sure on reviews foes it run big or little...hav gotten both
customer_reviews.author: gijane58

customer_reviews.title: Size guide needs to be updated or corrected in some way.
customer_reviews.text: So I just or this delivered about 20 mins ago so I tried it on the doggo. The product guide for finding the right size is highly inaccurate. I measured my doggo and she’s supposedly a Large. It fits really tight and the headband doesn’t fit her at all. I can’t even get the Velcro on the middle portion of the costume to stay together. She looks good in it. But also looks uncomfortable because of how tight it is.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M

customer_reviews.title: Great material, funky cut skirt, runs a bit larger than normal.
customer_reviews.text: The shiny fabric is great for a costume. However, the starred skirt portion is way too huge. Even though the chest portion fits like a glove, the skirt just has too much material & drags on the ground...should have been tapered a bit more. Easy to fix with some scissors or needle/thread, I guess, but still. Sizing seems to run a bit larger than most pet clothing. My tibetan spaniel / beagle mix (20lbs) normally wears right large stuff slightly loosely (mediums are too tight)...but the large here was ridiculously huge on her. We go the medium as a replacement & it fits her perfectly (chest-wise).
customer_reviews.author: El Jefe

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Measured my dog (Aussie/Catahoula mix, about 45lbs) and she measured in between the XL and L. Ordered the XL first thinking it would give her some wiggle room, got it and it looked WAY too big. Ordered the L next and it looks like it should be a small or medium but the tag in it says large. Seems very odd. Edit: If I could give zero stars, I would. Tried the XL on my dog and it wouldn't even close around her chest. The measurements are WAY off...so beware. Also, when returning both the L and XL, in order to use a UPS Dropoff, I would have to pay $7.46 to return. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Barefoot

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off, this item runs larger than advertized
customer_reviews.text: Love the costume but it is a bit too large. I measured my Yorkshire Terrier and based on the sizing chart, she should be a small. Clearly, from the picture a small is too big. It's cheaper to alter it rather than send it back. My order was also missing the adorable headpiece so I docked a star for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Addict

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume
customer_reviews.text: A little big for my 25 pound Corgi, but might be her body type. Still super cute and she loved wearing it! Size L
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: Great costume for my baby!
customer_reviews.text: This is great little costume for pups. I ordered the medium for my 13lb miniature dachshund and it fit perfectly! Obviously her "hot dog" shape makes it a little funny, but it looks great! The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because the headpiece snapped as soon as I put it on! I just fixed it myself so it really wasn't a huge problem, but still a little frustrating. It is so cute though, so it's okay! I would recommend it if you are looking for a costume for your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Aussie!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased an XXL for our 91 lb Australian Shepherd/Great Pyrenees mix. The material is a little stretchy so it has some give to it which is pretty nice. We will have to cut the tag off of the headpiece because the tag is huge and shows from underneath the strap. The headpiece strap is elastic with velcro closure. I would recommend this costume.
customer_reviews.author: Candi Strong

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of great costumes -- Supergirl and Wonder Woman. One medium for my then 4 month old puppy, one small for my smaller also 4 month old puppy....both settled into wearing them with ease, suggesting they were comfortable and well enough fitting to not be a distraction. Both costumes survived the challenges put before them in dog play and will be recycled next year when I'm raising other puppies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend but buy your dogs true size.
customer_reviews.text: Costume is great. I would recommend getting your dogs true size. After reading some reviews I went a size up and it's too big but okay. My dog is a chihuahua terrier mix, weighs approximately 11 lbs and I bought a medium when she was probably a small like I usually buy. Would recommend. Prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super hero powers activated
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that if you have your fur baby wear this when it is pouring rain for an entire fun run, and they have white fur, the colors from the costume will bleed. But other than that this is a great choice for a superhero duo. My pup even won best paired costume.
customer_reviews.author: Delana Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Cute outfit.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 month old Olde English bulldog so I ordered a medium on accident and it was too short. At the time she was only 27 lbs. I ordered a large at 32 lbs and it is the correct length but a little tight around her chest. The dress is beautiful but the headband on large is too big but the medium headband fits perfect (not that it stays on nor will she keep it on). I do not like the straps on the headband as the Velcro doesn't allow for adjustment. I also do not like that there are ridiculously large tags on the headband so you will have to cut them off
customer_reviews.author: tiaraTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Woman X's 2
customer_reviews.text: It fit the dog and looks adorable. She is ready for Trick or Treating. Have a lunatic in our family who is dressing as wonder woman also and he did not know that we had gotten our dog a wonder woman costume, now he wants to use the dog as his side kick. Their costumes are so similar. Oh this is going to be a crazy one.
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Won a costume contest with it
customer_reviews.text: It fits funny, but over all it worked. For a lab it’s tight around the armpits and loose around the belly. The headband was super loose. Long story short, my little girl did win a costume contest with it! The quality is good, well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Woodister

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I have a small 20lb corgi and got a medium. The length was great for a long doge. It's a little snug on her. But didn't want to take a chance on a large
customer_reviews.author: The Florida Corgi Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Outfit was beautiful and was made out of great material. Dress fit a medium size pig and Chihuahua. The pug was not very happy wearing it, buy the Chihuahua was. I would definitely buy another costume from this seller. Costume was exactly what the description said.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. Got this for my 2 year old husky-lab ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Got this for my 2 year old husky-lab mix and it fits her perfectly. The material is shiny without seeming cheap. The seams are well made. It connects with Velcro at the chest and leaves the belly and tail open. There's a headband accessory which is quite the cherry on top, assuming your dog tolerates things on her head (which mine does not). The only negative I could say is that it fits similar to a harness so they may expect to go for a walk. I couldn't disappoint that happy face Definitely recommend for your nerdy Halloween shenanigans
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small so order up a size or two and the skirt is very very long.
customer_reviews.text: Halloween costume for my 14 year old Jack Russell Boo who weighs 21 lbs, I ordered a Large and it fit pretty good, a little snug but was easy to put on and take off, She looked adorable! The skirt is really long so I tucked the sides in so she could walk comfortably. Overall perfect for her because she truly is a wonder woman dog!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this costume. This review is way over due. I have a 12 lb Shih Tzu and ordered it in a Medium and it fit her great. My only issue was that the skirt was a little long so she would step on it and the headband elastic was way to loose. But i pinned her headband to her dress and it stayed. She even won second place at our city Halloween contest!
customer_reviews.author: Jenaro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Small for my 11lbs Morkie and it fit her perfectly!! The head band didn’t stay on at all, but I wasn’t expecting to use it regardless.. I wish it had a hole to wear a harness underneath it... It was perfect!!! Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Alessandromvsp

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and a good fit! My dog is shaped weirdly and I had some trouble with this costume digging into her armpits, but I just tied a bit of string on the costume to keep the costume from irritating her and it was great! I'd highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: mrs042515

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and really cute
customer_reviews.text: This is way better quality than I expected! It is absolutely adorable. I think my pup hates it but I love it. I have a 50 lb goldendoodle and the XL fits her perfectly. The headband is a bit loose but I doubt she’ll wear it anyway. Really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: This was a great costume. Built well enough that she wore it a handful of times and not a stitch tore. It's some kind of stretchy spandex like material so it fits even if your dog isn't skinny. Mine has a very large chest so it was a bit tight there, but fit plenty well enough. She's about 55lbs, German Shepherd/pit bull mix, about 20" tall at the front shoulder, 17" neck, about 2' from neck to tail. I've attached a picture. I'd definitely recommend this costume.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Such great quality! I was very happy! My dog even kept the headband on which was surprising. She was soaking up the attention from all the trick or treaters and was a happy doggo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large size costume for large size dog
customer_reviews.text: Love love this costume I have a black lab husky mix 69 pound fits her perfectly the material stretchy so it’s very comfortable for her to move in one of the best costumes I’ve ever bought her for size and fit bought a 2X
customer_reviews.author: Richard R.

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Woman to the rescue!
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extra large costume so I ordered this one and it was perfect. Very comfortable and breathable as we live in Florida. It was a little long for Mocha because she is short but double sided hemming tape worked wonders.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Woman Costume
customer_reviews.text: This costume fit my miniature schnauzer perfectly! I ordered a size medium. I was initially worried it might be too small in the chest because my girl measures at about 18 inches, but it fits her to a T! Very nicely made. Looks great. She even keeps the headband on and she hates anything being on top of her head. Great costume overall. Shipping was fast. No complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: BlitznSchnitz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We have an Anatolian shepherd mix she’s currently 52lbs and we got the XL. It JUST fits her so next time we know to do XXL but this will work for now. She is still growing too.
customer_reviews.author: tom brown

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like pictured item
customer_reviews.text: The item I received looked absolutely nothing like the one in the picture or as described. It was also way larger than described (for a medium/large dog). It was another super hero costume but it had fake human legs in the front and it looked like some very thick cotton material. And again, it was huge. I sent it back immediately and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Peopleperson

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Puppy!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little short and a little snug for this 12.5lb pup, but still cute, easy to put on, and appeared comfy to move around in. I will probably lower the armholes for a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Cute
customer_reviews.text: My dog was hard to fit because she has a narrow but deep chest and nothing ever fits the depth of her chest, but the costume was really cute. Headband did not stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Slo Reader

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Ivy
customer_reviews.text: Ivy is a 60lb black lab and LOVES wearing costumes - partly because she loves the attention. It fits her mostly well, though it is a bit loose on her (she's uncharacteristically not overweight for a lab).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Dog costume - 2XL for 70lb lab
customer_reviews.text: The 2X size fits my 70 lb lab perfectly. Its a nice material, shiny and a little stretchy. It looked huge when I took it out of the pkg, but fits her great. She doesn't really enjoy wearing it - so we will put it on her and take some photos - but that's probably about it. -1 star because our headband arrived ripped. I could fix it, but I dont think my dog wants to wear it, so I will probably not fix it.
customer_reviews.author: DZKimmi

customer_reviews.title: Super Dog
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 month old Bernese loved the costume and was the belle of the ball. She was super in every way! It fit perfectly wasn't constricting. Just make sure to accurately measure your dog, as they are pretty accurate sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley D. Archie

customer_reviews.title: Shes now 65 lbs and it fits her like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I got a large for my pitbull puppy who was around 40 lbs at the time. It fit a little loose on her and was a little long. Shes now 65 lbs and it fits her like a glove! The material doesnt bother her and is SO cute. The sheen on the fabric also makes it difficult to see any stains on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neck too small
customer_reviews.text: Although the costume was adorable, medium did not fit the neck of my 16lb Cavalier King Charles. She has a very small neck. Any shirt or costume I have purchased for her it has been a problem. I needed about two more inches to Velcro this costume.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Was HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: My dog was eaten alive in the XXL (she is 55 lbs so not small) so we returned it (easy peasy!) and got the XL and it was a bit snug! Which makes no sense... but it looked adorable once it wasnt gaping on her!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great value - cute and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Really great last-minute find for our buxom Catahoula Cur! I had to extend it to accommodate her but the skirt was perfect and moved good with her waggle. So affordable and it didn’t rip or tear. I’ll definitely seek out the same product line next year.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Public

customer_reviews.title: Won best actress, er, costume!
customer_reviews.text: My darling Gigi was the belle of the (Halloween) ball in her Wonder Woman ensemble. Fit her well and looked absolutely darling! The only thing I would change is to add a small hole for the tail so the skirt falls a bit better when she's standing. So cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Halah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 52 lb
customer_reviews.text: This was the 3rd costume I bought due to sizing issues. Oddly some of the other X-Large Rubies costumes were a little too tight but this one is perfect. I can close the front of the dress and she has worn it comfortably for 2-3 hours at a time. The head piece stays on well although she is not thrilled about wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kona Cove

customer_reviews.title: Sizing inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Two reviews said size small was perfect for 8lb dogs. Ordered small. The package said small but it was for 11lb dogs. Much too big.
customer_reviews.author: M2T

customer_reviews.title: We both love it!
customer_reviews.text: This XXXL version (lol) fits my 85 pound GSD/Husky mix pretty much perfectly. It's slightly loose under the tummy area but that's fine. She's one of the rare weirdos that actually really enjoys wearing clothes. I think she looks adorable and I now can't wait for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, Well thought Out Costume!
customer_reviews.text: This costume is SO CUTE. The headband totally makes it! We were incredibly impressed by how simple it was to get on our dog and everyone enjoyed it Halloween night. Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! Bought the XL for my slim 60lbs ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Bought the XL for my slim 60lbs GSD and it's a little big so she feels comfy in it!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Lee

customer_reviews.title: I would have been happy if there was at least one full star showing
customer_reviews.text: The stars are a straight line. Unfortunately, it is on the bottom edge and top edge, in which every star is cut. I would have been happy if there was at least one full star showing. Also, the WW patch is much smaller. It is a cute costume, and the sizing chart is accurate. Too bad it doesn't look like the picture description.
customer_reviews.author: Link37

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but long
customer_reviews.text: Much too long on my pup. But I feel if I had gone a smaller size then her chest would not have comfortably fit. It also had a couple of small spots that wore off on the metallic areas, and it was only worn once. Still a pretty good value. It looked SUPER cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: WONDERful.
customer_reviews.text: It fit my Stella perfectly. She has since passed away, but was my WonderDog and I’m so glad this costume was able to capture that. The headband was a bit too big but everything else fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: The large fits my 28lb mini Aussie well. The measuring chart is a little off though. Her neck to tail length was correct but it was telling me that the large wouldn't fit because of her belly (she's a little chunky) but I'm glad I went with my gut and got the large instead of extra large because it fits around her belly just fine and the skirt goes all the way to her tail. The head band is way to big as others said, so I'll probably tie it or add extra Velcro. The costume is also good material, seems high quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: This was probably the best $15 I've ever spent
customer_reviews.text: This was probably the best $15 I've ever spent. I have a greyhound, and we have never had luck finding a costume to fit her huge, yet super skinny build. She looked SO cute in it! It was easy to get on her, and she didn't mind wearing it! Even the little headband. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ecurb

customer_reviews.title: Fit my papillon very well!
customer_reviews.text: This was a very cute and comfy costume for my little Papillon. She kept it on, and I was able to keep the head band (which is why I bought this one) on her head with small bobby pins.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Best buy ever.  Holds up great while running in the park.
customer_reviews.text: OMG! My girl was too cute! As a heads up, the item runs small. I had too exchanged a large for an extra large for my "not so miniature" Aussie (about 40lbs-45lbs). But the colors are vibrant and the design allows free movement for her to run. And run and wrestle she did all over the the dog park during costumes party with her cape flying. She came home tired, muddy and winning "Honorable Mention". I washed it with a load of darks on the gentle cycle and it came out like new and good to go. Happy purchase...Happy pup!
customer_reviews.author: Pope

customer_reviews.title: So adorable
customer_reviews.text: This was our first Halloween with our rescue and since we named her Justice, we all dressed up as the Justice League!!! Her costume was so cute!! She's a very stocky lab mix, about 57ish lbs here. Sometimes it would shift a bit but hey, she's a dog and she moves. Putting her front legs through it was a but challenging but luckily she was chill enough to let me do it.
customer_reviews.author: AK10

customer_reviews.title: WONDER-FUL!
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious! Although we ordered an SXL for our 60 lb Wirehaired Pointing Griffon (based on sizing as provided) and it's too big. An XL would have been sufficient. We're keeping it and will just take in around her tummy with a safety pin. Can't wait to great all the kids this Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Rivera Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Adorbz!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my yorkie so we could match with my Wonder Woman costume. She fit loosely in a Medium and she’s 13lbs. My only complaint is the tiara Velcro is too big. Had to tie it under her chin. See my pics!
customer_reviews.author: stonegyrl

customer_reviews.title: Weird sizing
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is super weird so we had to return the first order. HUGE size jump from XL to XXL. The XXL was swallowing my 55 LB dog but the XL is a bit snug but worked! Overall she was adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Palmer

product_meta.title: DC Comics Wonder Woman Pet Costume
product_meta.description: Size:MediumOfficially licensed DC Comics Wonder Woman pet costume features Wonder Woman symbol headpiece and red dress with Wonder Woman symbol, blue skirt with gold belt and white stars. IMPORTANT! NOT ALL COSTUMES WILL FIT ALL PETS, consider costume style and animal size; READ THE RUBIE’S PET SIZE CHART and WATCH THE SIZING INSTRUCTION VIDEO, do not select size based on breed. Family-owned, family-focused, and based in the U.S.A. since 1950, Rubie’s is the world’s largest designer and manufacturer of costumes – of course they’d remember your four-legged best friend!
feature_bullets: Wonder Woman pet costume features Wonder Woman symbol headpiece and red dress with Wonder Woman symbol, blue skirt with gold belt and white stars
IMPORTANT! PLEASE READ recent reviews and Q&A's before purchase to determine the best size for your pet; NOT ALL COSTUMES WILL FIT ALL PETS or breeds without adjustment
READ THE RUBIE’S PET SIZE CHART and WATCH THE SIZING INSTRUCTION VIDEO, do not select size based on breed; consider costume style and animal shape before ordering
Officially licensed DC Comics pet costume, items shipped and sold directly by Amazon are guaranteed to be authentic
Search for Rubie's DC Comics matching people costumes, like Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman, Supergirl, Batgirl, The Flash, Green Lantern, Robin, Joker and many more for great group costumes

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
